message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring to your business.

Thank you for your proposal, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price. I would like to make a counteroffer of $700,000.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $700,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to be flexible, but I need a price that reflects its worth. How about $900,000? This feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to increase my counteroffer to $850,000. I hope this aligns better with the value you're seeking.
